person.persName: Andrew Jackson Ballard (Louisville, KY, clerk of US Dist. Ct.)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky native. Married to Frances A. Ballard. Father of Charles T. Ballard, S. Thruston Ballard, Rogers C. Ballard, Mina Ballard, and Abby Ballard. Attorney in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned nine enslaved persons in Louisville in 1850. Attorney in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1860. Owned nine enslaved persons in Louisville in 1860. Clerk of the United States District Court of Kentucky in Louisville from January 11, 1862, to June 6, 1870.
